messages.subject: re: Christmas birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: Oh that s right, I forget that Dec. 21 is the solstice!  My DD was sent home from the hospital in a giant stocking! From: Debra Bures
messages.messageBody:
Oh that's right, I forget that Dec. 21 is the solstice!  My DD was sent home from the hospital in a giant stocking!
 
From: "Debra Bures" <buresfam@...>
Subject: re: Christmas birthdays

Kim writes
<<My DD has her birthday on the 21st of December. >>
>>My dd also has a 21 December
birthday--she is our solstice girl! Actually she was due the 2nd week in Jan. and I went into labor in November so we were delighted she chose Dec 21 to join us!  She is truly a child of light--her laughter and compassion are gifts.<<
 Debra

messages.subject: re: Christmas birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: Kim writes  My dd also has a 21 December birthday--she is our solstice girl! Actually she was due the 2nd
messages.messageBody:
Kim writes
<<My DD has her birthday on the 21st of December. >>
My dd also has a 21 December birthday--she is our solstice girl! Actually she was due the 2nd week in Jan. and I went into labor in November so we were delighted she chose Dec 21 to join us!  She is truly a child of light--her laughter and compassion are gifts.
 Debra
